q: said after the hearing. it was hell right from the moment we said' i do' at our wedding until the moment we split, just because my mother-in-law interfered in every single thing in our lives. it was impossible. it led to one argument after another and there was no way a marriage could survive after that. Luca Rossi said he would consider marriage again- but only if he did not have to deal with a mother-in-law.
